verbs.description: On his [ARGM-LOC: nationally] [V: syndicated] [ARG1: radio talk show] Tuesday , host Mark Levin briefly discussed President Donald Trump and the Russia investigation , asking his audience , “ [ W]hat ’s going on with Marco Rubio ? ”
